title: 2 Easy Ways to Share a Zoom Meeting Link to Invite Others

steps.title: Start a Zoom meeting.
steps.content: Start a Zoom meeting. You can use the Zoom desktop client, mobile app, or go to https://www.zoom.com in a web browser. You must be the host or have proper permissions to share the meeting link. If needed, you can create an account . You can also join a meeting . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select Participants.
steps.content: Select Participants . You can find this in the meeting controls. This icon looks like two overlapping people.

steps.title: Select Invite.
steps.content: Select Invite . This is at the bottom of the Participants panel. A pop-up window will open with invite options.

steps.title: Select any tab.
steps.content: Select any tab. You can select Contacts , Zoom Rooms , Desk Phones , Room System , Email , or Call Out or SMS . You can also use any of these options to invite users.

steps.title: Select Copy Invite Link.
steps.content: Select Copy Invite Link . This will copy the Zoom link for your current meeting. You can also select Copy Invitation to copy the full invitation text with meeting information.

steps.title: Paste the URL.
steps.content: Paste the URL. You can paste the link in an email, another website, or another app. Press Ctrl + V (Windows) or Cmd + V (Mac) to paste , or right-click the text field and select Paste .

steps.title: Sign into Zoom.
steps.content: Sign into Zoom. You can use the Zoom desktop client, mobile app, or go to https://www.zoom.com in a web browser.

steps.title: Select Meetings.
steps.content: Select Meetings . You'll see this in the vertical menu on the left side of the page (web browser) or in the horizontal menu at the top of the window (desktop client).

steps.title: Select the meeting you want to share.
steps.content: Select the meeting you want to share. More options will appear. If you're using the desktop client, hover over the meeting. This will be in the Upcoming tab.

steps.title: Select Copy Invitation.
steps.content: Select Copy Invitation . It's to the right of the Start button.

steps.title: Share your copied invite.
steps.content: Share your copied invite. You can paste the link into an email, another website, or another app. Press Ctrl + V (Windows) or Cmd + V (Mac) to paste, or right-click the text field and select Paste .
